metadata.title: CVE-2017-17535 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: lib/gui.py in Bob Hepple gjots2 2.4.1 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: gjots2 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
